infos.value: Commander Lilyth?
Lilyth...
I'm sorry.
I just can't seem to shake my worries.
Could it be...that you have feelings for Schuzeâ€”
Y-you fool! Think before you speak!
It's not like that.
You don't have to hide it...
Schuzelt is a good man. That is without question.
But I gave up living the life of a woman long ago.
Huh? But why?
For my dream.
Your dream...?
To see Lord Mont become a king worth following.
War would finally cease to be in this land if he were crowned. I'm sure of it.
Even now, Lord Mont's determination is leading us to that future.
That is why I have no qualms dedicating my life to his cause.
Lilyth...
I eagerly await the day you lead our kingdom, Lord Mont.
Then I can hang up my sword and take my time scouring through suitors.
Right?
I'll take your words to heart.
All right, then let's make haste. I doubt our pursuers have given up just yet.
